title: Apology
lyrics: Eonjena neon gateun ja rie Hangsang nal gidaryeotjiman I was gone I was gone. Babogati nareul mit ji ma Yeongwonhi neol jikigetdan mal Geojitmal geojitmal. Oneulttara jaju bodeon TV dramaeseon Ppeonhan jangmyeondeuri nal bomyeo biutgo isseo Nan machi joeincheoreom run away Neon oneuldo naege sori jilleo go away. Naega igijeogin nomiran geol Sasohan gwansimeul baran nega Geu heunhan sajin han jangdo Urin naman saenggakhae. Mian mian Jikyeojuji mothae mianhae jal salgilbarae Mian mian neodo nal ijeo jwo Yeongwonhi hamkkehajan geu yaksok Ije neun eomneun geoya Jikyeojuji mothaeseo mianhae .
